headline: Procare Solutions Continues to Deliver Secure, Compliant Software
summary: Procare Solutions, a leader in child care management software, is pleased to announce that ChildPlus, a Procare Solutions company serving Head Start providers, has also received the distinction of being SOC 2 Type 2 compliant by taking steps far beyond what is required by law to secure data.

raw.headline: Procare Solutions Continues to Deliver Secure, Compliant Software

headline: Aderant Appoints Josiah Chaves as New Chief Client Officer
summary: ATLANTA, April 15, 2025--Aderant has announced the appointment of Josiah Chaves as its new Chief Client Officer, underscoring its commitment to client success.

raw.headline: Aderant Appoints Josiah Chaves as New Chief Client Officer
